channel.title: Coasted [ 718/752 ] Just Opened // Need Players - Join Now
channel.description:
[center] [img]http://i58.tinypic.com/2v3fq1h.png[/img]
[size=12pt][b]CoastedScape Website:[/b] [url=http://coastedscape.com/]http://coastedscape.com/[/url][/size] [b]Forums[/b] [url=http://coastedscape.com/]http://coastedscape.com/[/url][/center]
[center][img]http://i57.tinypic.com/1z17csk.jpg[/img][/center]
[b]CoastedScape Content:[/b]
[b]ITEMS ARE DROPPED ON DEATH.[/b] -100% Shops fixed price and etc. - Eco Base - All new RS Items - Dominion tower - Achievments - Cosmetic Overrides - Runespan / Lava Flow / Livid Farm / Dungeoneering - Zombies Onslaught Minigame - Endless waves of zombies - Max of 50 zombies on field at once - Dungeoneering System - Lobby system and multi-player - 753 items and interfaces - Drygores, Kalphite Armour, Pernix, virtus Dual Weild Etc/ - Boss Contracts, to influence more bossing (works really well) - Contracts offer large rewards for killing the contract - Only need to kill boss once to complete contract - All Skills Working - Now has Flawless switching - High/Low Alching + Enchanting - Automated double exp weekends - Difficulty Selections - Custom Prestige System - Bounty hunter skulls to show your prestige level - Prestige shop with Clay weapons, Battle-Mage, trickster, and more - 6 prestige levels in total - Skilling Rewards - Each skill action you gain 1 skill point - Skill Point shop to get exp boosting items - PvP System - Pk Points per kill - Killstreaks - PkP Shop - PvM & PvP BASED! - Loyalty Points - Custom titles for loyal members - Auras - Squeal of Fortune - 2 spins every 24 hours - Fight Caves, 63 waves - Fight Kiln, 32 waves - Full Nex - Godwars - Corporal Beast - King Black Dragon - Nomad - Avatar of Destruction - Glacors - Blink - Party Demon - Yk'Lagor the Thunderous - Queen/King Black Dragon - Kalphite Queen
[size=18pt]And So Much More![/size] [size=14pt]So much cannot even list it.[/size]
[center][size=18pt]Join Now: [url=http://coastedscape.com/]http://coastedscape.com/[/url][/size][/center] Was a Rune-Evo v3 Base.

EDIT

Great server, players are joining and actually staying, Chris aswell as him staff team welcomed me and helped me around the server, and once you join, I’m sure you’ll stay.
